thread.title: BRIEF-Maple Gold Mines Announces Non-Brokered Private Placement Of Up To $3,800,000

title: BRIEF-Maple Gold Mines Announces Non-Brokered Private Placement Of Up To $3,800,000
text: 53 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Maple Gold Mines Announces Non-Brokered Private Placement Of Up To $3,800,000 Reuters Staff March 19 (Reuters) - Maple Gold Mines Ltd: * MAPLE GOLD ANNOUNCES NON-BROKERED PRIVATE PLACEMENT OF UP TO $3,800,000 * ‍PLANS TO COMPLETE PRIVATE PLACEMENT FINANCING FOR AGGREGATE GROSS PROCEEDS OF UP TO C$3.8 MILLION * ‍OFFERING TO BE FINANCED THROUGH ISSUANCE OF 15.8 MILLION COMMON SHARES AT $0.24 PER SHARE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
